casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Jason M. MYERS, a/k/a Rashon Watts, Rason Watts, Jeffery Myers, Defendant-Petitioner. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff,
v.
Yusef T. Myers, a/k/a Yusef T. Myers, Jr., Yusuf T. Myers, Defendant. C-834 September Term 2017
080508 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-4077/4679-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
